items.headline: Nvidia’s stock falls on China fears. How much should investors worry?
items.summary_en: Some analysts view China’s reported move to ban sales of Nvidia’s RTX Pro 6000D as “political theater” and “posturing” in light of trade talks with the U.S.

items.headline: My mother’s lawyer stole $400K after she moved to a nursing home. How can we get justice?
items.summary_en: “Within a month, her home had fraudulently been put up for sale and her vehicle stolen.”

items.headline: ‘Am I the biggest loser with the Fed rate cut?’ I’m 68, retired and live off IRAs and Social Security
items.summary_en: The Federal Reserve cut policy rates by 25 basis points, to a range of 4% to 4.25%, and pencils in two more reductions this year.

items.headline: Markets didn’t know which way to go after Wednesday’s Fed rate cut. Expect more volatility ahead.

items.headline: StubHub’s stock dips in a mixed reaction to the polarizing practice of ticket resales and signals of a softer economy

items.headline: Cracker Barrel tried to win back customers by abandoning its logo and remodels. But it still sees fewer diners up ahead.
items.summary_en: Shares of Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc. fell after hours on Wednesday after the Americana-themed restaurant chain forecast falling traffic for the fiscal year ahead and sales that were below Wall Street’s expectations, as it deals with blowback over efforts to change its logo and remodel its stores.

items.headline: Protein snacks are getting more popular thanks to weight-loss drugs, says General Mills
items.summary_en: While people on GLP-1 drugs are reducing their overall calories, the packaged-foods producer says they have a growing hunger for protein as they lose muscle mass.

items.headline: Bots make buying concert tickets a nightmare. Could the FTC’s Ticketmaster probe help?
items.summary_en: As the FTC ramps up its war against resell bots with its latest Ticketmaster investigation, what can be done to level the playing field so that bots don’t grab all the Taylor Swift tickets?
